If you are an experienced developer, you can become a mentor yourself and help your coworkers continue professional development.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We've launched our JavaScript Competency Center educational channels on  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCShZmic3ZZdh9sZ6UA144Cw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"YouTube channe\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"l and at the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://github.com/EPAM-JS-Competency-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GitHub repository\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you need to fill in the blanks and acquire new in-demand skills quickly, you can take advantage of micro-learnings. Micro-learnings are our self-study educational programs with flexible schedules and online Q&A sessions, where experts show you how to solve practical tasks using real code. The list of programs can be extended following the review of the most active experts.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/topics/global/competencies-technologies/articles/2021/jul/jscc-programs-overview_en.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"article \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to get an overview of the existing courses. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep an eye on our newsletters for new program launches.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We've also put together a guide for \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/LevelUp+Materials\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LevelUp Materials\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to help you navigate your career prospects, figure out your path to reaching new goals, understand the requirements for different positions, and acquire new skills and knowledge. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
